claim_card.claim: The paper argues curvature is not the ultimate invariant; instead the invariant is coherence dynamics that can express as curvature downstream.
claim_card.test_hook: In gravitational analogs/simulations, test whether coherence-metric stabilization predicts macroscopic curvature-like behavior.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: curvature is not the ultimate invariantâ€”coherence is.
